page.title: 02NEWTON-IN-FURNESS CONT.
page.content: ONLY FORTY YEARS AGO A SURVEY OF OUR BLOCK WOULD HAVE SHOWN A DIFFERENT SITUATION THAN TODAY. NOWADAYS THE ONCE THRIVING IRON MINES ARE EMPTIED OF ALL THE USABLE IRON AND ONLY SLAG (OF A SORT) IS LEFT. THERE ARE ONLY FOUR FARMS IN OUR BLOCK, NEWTON VILLAGE ITS SELF HAS NOT A SINGLE FARM. THE PEOPLE MAINLY TRAVEL SOME DISTANCE TO WORK. THE MAIN EMPLOYERS ARE VICKERS LTD SHIPBUILDERS, WHO BUILD NUCLEAR SUBMARINES, GLAXO AND BOWATER-SCOTT WHO MAKE TISSUE PRODUCTS. HERE IS A LIST OF THE OCCUPATIONS OF THE PEOPLE IN NEWTON VILLAGE_SELF EMPLOYED VILLAGE BLACKSMITH, BUILDER, PLASTERER, CAR SALESMAN, PHOTOGRAPHER,PUBLICANS,SHIPYARD ENGINEERING WORKERS, PATHOLOGIST, SHOP ASSISTANTS, FARMER, MACHINIST AND 2 DOG BREEDERS THIS IS NOT A FULL LIST.
